Package algorithms.imageProcessing

Class SpurRemover

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.SpurRemover
  • public class SpurRemover
extends java.lang.Object
    and incomplete class to remove single pixels spur patterns from curves, with the assumption that the given points are curves. It also corrects a few features to make the main use of the results easier, that is, assembly of the border points of a curve into an ordered sequence around the perimeter.
    Author:
    nichole
